simlib.geometry.vangle¶

simlib.geometry.vangle(a, b, method='atan2')[source]¶

Compute the angle between two vectors.

If method = ‘atan2’,

..math :: theta = atan2(norm(cross(a, b)), dot(a, b))

If method = ‘acos’,

..math :: theta = acos frac{a dot b}{|a| |b|}

Parameters

  • b (a,) – Vectors

  • method (str) – Using ‘atan2’ or ‘acos’ method of computing angle.

Returns

Angle between vectors

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray
